description: Sample VS Code task manifest for extracted SD flows (validate SD zip, build PPL from extracted SD).

tasks.label: sd-validate
tasks.notes: Validates the extracted SD zip and manifests using OrchestrationCli.

tasks.label: sd-build-ppl
tasks.notes: Builds the PPL from the extracted SD zip; expects labview-icon-api.zip under builds/artifacts in the extracted SD.

tasks.label: sd-vi-history
tasks.notes: Runs the read-only vi-history suite against the extracted SD (no bind/build); refuses Program Files SdRoot and logs under reports/logs.
